name: Starmaker Story
storyline:
Due to an unexpected crisis at work, Anna and her husband Josef are in desperate need of help. As the player, you can assist Anna by helping her rise to fame on Starmaker, a platform for adult models.

Take on the roles of photographer, lover, and more as you navigate through the challenges and opportunities of Peak City.
summary: Starmaker Story is an immersive Adult Visual Novel where your dialogue choices shape the journey. Encounter and romance a variety of intriguing characters, grow your Starmaker Page, and unlock one of 11 unique endings.
